Section2-Desc: The Ministry of Agriculture of the Republic of Indonesia utilizes data analytics to measure food sovereignty and the welfare of technology-based farmers in Indonesia. Telkom assists the Ministry of Agriculture in implementing End-to-End Big Data On-Premise starting from the provision of Infrastructure, Big Data Platforms, Executive Dashboards, Social Media Analytics, and Penetration Tests. With this implementation, the Ministry of Agriculture can maximize the function of processing internal and external data into information that can support activities (work plans) and policies at the Ministry of Agriculture in entering the industrial era 4.0.
Section2-Objective: Integrating internal and external data into Command Center Dashboard (Checking Bulog rice stock, monitoring cattle, seed distribution, daily commodities, etc.)
